database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: The S. cerevisiae SUMO stress response is a transcription-dependent conjugation-deconjugation cycle

additional_fields.field: A protein modification that effectively replaces one hydrogen atom with a hydroxyl group.

A protein modification that effectively results in the loss of an ammonia, usually by a process of vicinal dehydration, rearrangement, and rehydration with release of ammonia, resulting in a loss of nitrogen with no gain of oxygen.
